reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 417/01: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO APPROVE PLANS OF SUBDIVISION - HALDIMAND COUNTY, NORFOLK COUNTY, BARRIE, KENORA AND TIMMINS
reg_info.reg_name_text: Delegation of Authority to Approve Plans of Subdivision - Haldimand County, Norfolk County, Barrie, Kenora and Timmins
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 417/01: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO APPROVE PLANS OF SUBDIVISION - HALDIMAND COUNTY, NORFOLK COUNTY, BARRIE, KENORA AND TIMMINS
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister’s authority under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision is delegated to, (a) the council of The Corporation of Haldimand County with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1; (b) the council of The Corporation of Norfolk County with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2; (c) the council of the City of Barrie with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 3; (d) the council of the City of Kenora with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 4; (e) the council of the City of Timmins with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 5. O. Reg. 417/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The Minister’s authority under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision is delegated to,

(a) the council of The Corporation of Haldimand County with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1;

(b) the council of The Corporation of Norfolk County with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2;

(c) the council of the City of Barrie with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 3;

(d) the council of the City of Kenora with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 4;

(e) the council of the City of Timmins with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 5. O. Reg. 417/01, s. 1.

content.content:
2. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 is in turn delegated to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing.
O. Reg. 417/01, s. 2 (1). (2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 417/01, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 is in turn delegated to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 417/01, s. 2 (1).

(2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 417/01, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 417/01, s. 3. Schedule 1 28T-89005 O. Reg. 417/01, Sched. 1. Schedule 2 28T-92003 O.
